document.full_text: india will become the world's most populous country in 2025, surpassing china, where the population will peak one year later because of declining fertility, according to u.s. projections.
document.title: in 2025, india to pass china in population, u.s. estimates
lines_and_colors: india will become the world's most populous country in 2025, surpassing china, where the population will peak one year later because of declining fertility, according to u.s. projections.
